original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a dynamic blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, where you will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. You will collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations, leveraging your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative solutions. As the technical lead in the vehicle configuration space, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting any issues that arise. Your strong analytical and problem-solving skills, coupled with your excellent communication and collaboration abilities, will enable you to identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. Additionally, your experience in Agile methodologies and vehicle configuration will be highly valued, as you work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of the system configurations.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within the [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, using tools such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

REQUIRED SKILLS:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques

PREFERRED SKILLS:
- Java experience
- SQL experience

REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:
- Hands-on experience in implementing and deploying ML and AI solutions

PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:
- Experience with Agile methodologies
- Experience in the vehicle configuration space

REQUIRED TOOLS:
- [Mention specific tools or technologies required for the role]

This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, where you will play a pivotal role in aligning our systems with the evolving needs of the business. As the technical lead in the vehicle configuration space, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations, leveraging your proficiency in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative solutions. Your ability to collaborate with stakeholders across various departments, understand their needs, and document them clearly will be essential in driving the success of this position.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Engage with stakeholders to thoroughly understand their business requirements, utilizing techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows to capture the necessary details
- Translate the gathered business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify opportunities for process optimization and system efficiency improvements, utilizing tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively identify and recommend configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system performance
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the seamless implementation and continuous support of the system configurations

REQUIRED SKILLS:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Demonstrated expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques

PREFERRED SKILLS:
- Proficient in Java programming
- Strong SQL skills for data analysis and reporting

REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:
- Substantial hands-on experience in implementing and deploying ML and AI solutions in a production environment

PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development
- Proven track record in the vehicle configuration domain

REQUIRED TOOLS:
- [Mention specific tools or technologies required for the role]

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business requirements, utilizing techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows to capture the necessary details
- Translate the gathered business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify opportunities for process optimization and system efficiency improvements, utilizing tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively identify and recommend configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system performance
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the seamless implementation and continuous support of the system configurations

- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
